data.actual_result: The right side is slightly longer than the left side (you may have to look at multiple profiles)
data.expected_result: Both sides should be the same length
data.short_description: There is a bigger gap on the right side of user profiles when users have 2 badges
data.steps_to_repro: - Open a profile with a person who has 2 badges - Look closely and observe the left side then the right side
